title: Total population of Bangladesh 2024
summary: Overall Inhabitants in millions has increased over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
The highest Inhabitants in millions, of value 170.06 was reached at Year 2021
The lowest Inhabitants in millions, of value 161.51 was reported at Year 2016
